column5: Our apartment is in an older, urban, residential neighborhood of Fort Worth. The apartment is spacious, clean, and bright; hardwood floors throughout. We have gone to great lengths to provide modern conveniences in a vintage setting. The large balcony provides a panoramic view of family-friendly Capp's Park. We are located close to TCU, Magnolia Ave restaurants, Sundance Square in downtown Fort Worth, hospitals, and the museums.
